meanings.definition: A person who does not read.
meanings.sent1: The nonreader struggled with understanding the book.
meanings.sent2: The library has a special program for nonreaders to develop a love for books.
meanings.sent3: The nonreader joked that they only read text messages.
meanings.sent4: Her bookshelf was empty, a clear sign of a nonreader.
meanings.sent5: The nonreader's lack of interest in books was evident to everyone.

meanings.definition: Not reading or unable to read.
meanings.sent1: The nonreader student preferred audio books.
meanings.sent2: The nonreader audience listened intently to the storyteller.
meanings.sent3: The nonreader cat ignored the newspaper left on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The nonreader sky seemed devoid of stars that night.
meanings.sent5: The nonreader phone displayed pictures instead of text.
